code: import React,{useCallback}from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./styles.css";import{CustomLink}from"../ui/index";import{account,account_active,sneaker,sneaker_active,exit}from"../../assets/index";import{getPageName}from"../../helpers/PageName";import{logout}from"../../redux/slices/auth";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SideNav=function SideNav(_ref){var avatar=_ref.avatar;var dispatch=useDispatch();var navigate=useNavigate();var href=getPageName();var onClickLogout=useCallback(function(){if(window.confirm("Are you sure you want to log out?")){dispatch(logout());window.localStorage.removeItem("token");navigate("/");}},[dispatch,logout]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"side-nav-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"avatar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"avatar",className:"image",src:avatar})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CustomLink,{className:"account",to:"/user/account",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"user",src:href!=="Account"?account:account_active}),"My Account"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CustomLink,{className:"orders",to:"/user/orders",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"ord",src:href!=="Orders"?sneaker:sneaker_active}),"My Orders"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"logout",onClick:onClickLogout,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"logout",src:exit}),"Logout"]})]})});};export default SideNav;
